watch_video_yukkuri.title: watch_video_yukkuri
watch_video_yukkuri.introduction: It is a video playback app for Android. The purpose is to understand the characteristics of the movement and identify any issues with the motion.
watch_video_yukkuri.operation: By checking the movement frame by frame, you can identify areas for improvement. Additionally, you can repeat playback within specific ranges by adjusting the starting and ending positions of the video.
